alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:05PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Baton Rouge and East Baton Rouge Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 405 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Allen, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, Addis, Brusly, Slaughter, Westminster, Merrydale, Inniswold, Village St. George, Gardere, Brownfields and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 151 and 164. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; West Baton Rouge
